title: Biden and McCarthy strike U.S. debt ceiling deal
description: On the cusp of the weekend, the 46th President of the United States, Joe Biden, and Kevin McCarthy, a leading Congressional Republican, brokered an agreement in principle to suspend the towering $31.4 trillion federal government debt ceiling. This critical breakthrough comes after a period of prolonged deadlock, marking a significant step towards averting a potential ... Read more

title: Polkadot’s XCM Channels Increase by 60%: Intelligence Firm
description:
Messari, a market intelligence page, noted that Polkadot’s cross-chain message format has expanded beyond just asset transfers. The number of XCM channels has reportedly seen a 60% increase. At press time, DOT was trading at $5.37 after it printed a 1.88% gain over the past 24 hours. The market intelligence page Messari shared in a […]

The post Polkadot’s XCM Channels Increase by 60%: Intelligence Firm appeared first on Coin Edition.
